code: import{createSelector}from"reselect";var selectMemberPage=function selectMemberPage(state){return state.memberPage;};export var retrieveChosenMember=createSelector(selectMemberPage,function(MemberPage){return MemberPage.chosenMember;});export var retrieveChosenMemberBoArticles=createSelector(selectMemberPage,function(MemberPage){return MemberPage.chosenMemberBoArticles;});export var retrieveChosenSingleBoArticle=createSelector(selectMemberPage,function(MemberPage){return MemberPage.chosenSingleBoArticle;});export var retrieveMemberFollowers=createSelector(selectMemberPage,function(MemberPage){return MemberPage.memberFollowers;});export var retrieveMemberFollowings=createSelector(selectMemberPage,function(MemberPage){return MemberPage.memberFollowings;});
